sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ username:'', age:'', gender:'', member:'', hobby:{ volleyball:false } } this.changes = this.changes.bind(this) } changes = (event) => { if(event.target.type === 'checkbox'){ //it's literally impossible to setState an Array this.setState({volleyball : true}) console.log(this.state.hobby) } else{ this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } } render(){ return(

Form Practice

UserName :
Age :
Gender : Male Female
Hobby : Futsal VolleyBall
Membership :

Result
UserName : {this.state.username}
Age : {this.state.age}
Gender : {this.state.gender}
Hobby : {this.state.hobby.map(value=> {return value+' '})}
MemberShip : {this.state.member}
) } } export default App;
